branchCategory.name: Accessories/Attachments
branchCategory.description: <p class="MsoNormal">Several additional products are available to complete the air preparation installation.  These include:  modular spacers for adding additional components; pressure relief valves for quickly relieving system pressure for service; soft start valves for controlled system pressurization; check valves; T- or cross spacers allow air access at intermediate points in the assembly; pressure switches for electrical confirmation of system pressure; and piping adapters for maintenance ease. <font color="#ff0000"> The current AC series is no longer being produced and is subject to available quantities only.  For size 10 models, please utilize the AC-A series.  For sizes 50~60, please utilize the AC-B series.  For sizes 20~40, please utilize the AC-A or AC-B series as appropriate to your performance and option needs.<o:p></o:p></font></p>

branchItem.name: VHS20-40, Residual Pressure Relief Valve, Modular, Epoxy Coated
branchItem.description: <p class="MsoNormal">The VHS series provides a convenient means of isolating supplied pressure in a pneumatic system and exhausting downstream pressure for maintenance purposes. The units can be locked in the exhaust position and can be an integral part of an energy isolation system. Air flow direction is easily identified by handle orientation and labeling.  The epoxy coated version provides an economical alternative for extended life in aggressive or washdown environments.  <span style="color: red;">The current VHS series is no longer being produced and is subject to available quantities only.  Please utilize the new white VHS models for new designs.</span></p>
